title: Elementalist Lux E Visual Bug
body: I was just playing a game as Twisted fate and i was clearing the Raptor camp with about 1/5 of my health left when i suddenly drop dead and it says the enemy lux had killed me but i did not see any of her abilities on my screen nor did i see lux when it happened. She was in the fog of war. I pointed it out in all chat and she said she threw her E over the wall but i did not see it or hear it being cast. There was nothing on my screen, i just suddenly died and i didn't know why lol xD

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! This was something I was unable to repro on my end. Would you happen to know the form she was in? Do you have a video of this occurring? Any addition info would be much appreciated!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=BevLQ9Ed,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-01T16:59:37.832+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! This was something I was unable to repro on my end. Would you happen to know the form she was in? Do you have a video of this occurring? Any addition info would be much appreciated!

If i remember correctly, she was in the water form. I could be wrong but i remember her using water that game.  Sorry i don't have video footage :'c 

If you don't find anything, ill keep a lookout and come back if i see it happening again and hopefully i can be of more help ;-;
S'all good! I can poke around more, and if you have anything else/it happens again, don't hesitate to ping this thread again! :)
Oh i was also using the Underworld Twisted Fate skin if that helps lol
